title: Taric's Dazzle is now a cone based AoE stun

replies.body:
It also blinds all effect champions for the duration of the stun.

Doesn't really do anything, but they just had their eyes blasted with the power of gems, they shouldn't be able to see anything else since the fantastic image is burned into their eyes,
in order to be fabulous you need to FEEL THE BURN OF FABULOUSNESS{{champion:44}}

The question isn't "is Taric playable?" it's "why isn't anyone playing him?"

Taric/Graves against Kalista/heavy AD comps is outrageously potent.

> [{quoted}](name=Devi Freak Mint,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XkdYFwIv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-24T04:56:59.607+0000)
>
> The question isn't "is Taric playable?" it's "why isn't anyone playing him?"
> 
> Taric/Graves against Kalista/heavy AD comps is outrageously potent.

Ya Taric is actually the highest scaling support in the game. He has the highest win rate of all supports in games that last >35 mins, but as Riot as pointed out quite often "auras don't FEEL powerful."
I think its more cause late game when getting caught means certain death, he can front line and heavily and reliably punish squishies who stray.

I posted my [rework](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/rk2ORkAg-taric-rework-my-idea-and-thoughts) idea for Taric a while back where his E is a cone blind (and silence if empowered) and his stun is moved to his passive.
maybe it could be in a cone and stun the champions farthest away while blind the champions closer to the radius?
Or stun the close ones and charm the distant ones.
And if you really want to play Taric, just get his Bloodstone Skin, which is awesome.

> [{quoted}](name=Aratez Treaty,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XkdYFwIv,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-24T05:36:03.372+0000)
>
> And if you really want to play Taric, just get his Bloodstone Skin, which is awesome.

Pink is the only way to go. Bloodstone is his only "non fabulous skin" Default and emerald are passable. But to truly be a master of Taric, one MUST purchase his pink armor.
